plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be fiction, as all of the books mentioned are works of fiction. The user's favourite narrative structure is likely to be a combination of first-person and third-person narratives, as Catch-22, The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time, and In Cold Blood all feature these narrative structures.
